sentences.cn: …一幅我孙女阿梅莉亚的画像。

sentences.en: a drawing of my granddaughter Amelia
sentences.cn: 一幅我孙女阿梅莉亚的画像

sentences.en: A single old man can only be a burden on his granddaughter.
sentences.cn: 孤老汉,拖累着个小孙女.

sentences.en: Ben Franklin used Noah's book to teach his granddaughter to read.
sentences.cn: 本杰明?富兰克林曾用挪亚的书教他的孙女识字.

sentences.en: He lived apart , in his big house with his granddaughter.
sentences.cn: 他带着孙女离群索居, 住在一所大宅子里.

sentences.en: His granddaughter confused the papers on his desk.
sentences.cn: 他的孙女把他书桌上的书信文件弄乱了.

sentences.en: I do not want scum like you with an mile of my granddaughter!
sentences.cn: 我不想你这样的人靠近我的孙女!

sentences.en: I got a present for my baby granddaughter in a hurry.
sentences.cn: 我乐意地为我的小孙女准备了礼物.

sentences.en: I walk over and sit down between my mother and her granddaughter.
sentences.cn: 我走过去,坐在我母亲和她的孙女中间.

sentences.en: I'm a foal. I'm your granddaughter. Come with me.
sentences.cn: 我是一匹小马.我是你的孙女. 请跟我来.

sentences.en: In her will she left all her money to her granddaughter.
sentences.cn: 她在遗嘱中将所有的钱都留给了她的孙女.

sentences.en: Liddy, the master's great - granddaughter , was about Bathsheba's equal in age.
sentences.cn: 丽蒂是作坊师傅的重孙女, 和巴丝谢芭年龄相仿.

sentences.en: My granddaughter is a little doll.
My little granddaughter caught her heel in the spokes of her bicycle—it was a very nasty wound.
sentences.cn: 我小孙女的脚跟夹到自行车的轮辐里了，伤得很严重。

sentences.en: Oh, you look so beautiful, Susan. My granddaughter.
sentences.cn: 啊, 真漂亮, Susan我的好孙女.

sentences.en: Someone whom the old man loved -- a little granddaughter, perhaps had been killed.
sentences.cn: 老头儿心爱的什么人给杀死了 —— 或许是他的小孙女.

sentences.en: Such a lantern certainly made their granddaughter feel and proud.
sentences.cn: 这只灯笼让小外孙女感到十分骄傲.

trans.tran_en: the daughter of your son or daughter
